item.title: Alphabet sentences
item.description: A large fawn jumped quickly over white zinc boxes. A mad boxer shot a quick, gloved jab to the jaw of his dizzy opponent. A pox on you, jergens, old beanbag, youâ€™ve squashed my favorite zwieback. A quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog. A quick movement of the enemy will jeopardize six gunboats. About sixty codfish eggs will make a quarter pound of very fizzy jelly. Alfredo just must bring very exciting news to the plaza quickly.
